|brand = Olimex |model = A20-OLinuXino-Lime |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = 2 |revision = Rev K |subrevision = e16Gs16M |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 2018/01/21 |page_start_origon = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/olimex/olimex_a20-olinuxino-lime2 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;A20; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A7 (v7-A) |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- doc? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLMAG1JETD-B041; |flash1size = 16 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;25Q128JVSQ; |flash2size = 16 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT41K256M16HA-125:E; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Microchip;KSZ9031RN; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 30:1F:9A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2019.04; |stockos = Linux;4.19.5;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (OTG), SATA, Micro SD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_sata_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = BAT |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_bat = 3.7 |pwr_bat_amp = |pwr_bat_type = |pwr_bat_mAh = |pwr_bat_cells = |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 3-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = HDMI 1.4, Micro SD Card slot, LiPo battery connector, |addchip = PMIC;X-Powers Limited;AXP209;;1; ,,, 16Kb I2C Serial EEPROM;Atmel;ATMLH82916CM;;1;,,, 1A Low-Dropout Voltage Regulator;Advanced Monolithic Systems;AMS1117;;1;,,, 1.2MHz 2A Step Up Converter;Aerosemi;MT3608;;1;,,, 5.5V, 2A Low Loss Power Distribution Switch;Silergy Corp;SY6280;;3;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy;SY8089A;;2;,,, Micropower Voltage Supervisor;Microchip;MCP121T-475I;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = 1234 |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, Ubuntu 18.04, OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 05/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Bulgaria
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''"A20-OLinuXino-Lime2 Rev.K."'' is silkscreened on the board (below the GPIO-1 connector). {{see also|Allwinner|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' A20 (Dual-Core ARM Cortex-A7) @1 GHz *GPU: ''Mali-400'' *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM • Micron *Onboard Storage: 16GB eMMC, TF card (64GB)/MMC card slot *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 3x USB 2.0, 1x SATA
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OLinuXino#A20 ''OLinuXino A20'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[https://linux-sunxi.org/Olimex_A20-OLinuXino-Lime2 ''Olimex A20-OLinuXino-Lime2'' on '''Linux-SunXi'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/05/04/olimex-a20-olinuxino-lime2-emmc-board-replaces-nand-by-emmc-flash-for-better-performance-reliability/ ''Olimex A20-OLinuXino-LIME2 Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
